<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 7"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Grim Trophy](/Equipment.aspx?ID=216)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Enchantment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=61" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=155" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 567 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 55 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to armor

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Free Action" /><row>envision</row></row>

 

**Trigger** You attempt an Intimidation check to Coerce or Demoralize, but you haven't rolled yet

**Requirement** You are an expert in Intimidation
</row>

</column>

---

This talisman comes in many forms, most often a severed piece of a humanoid creature displayed in some gruesome manner. When you activate the trophy, select two targets and compare your Intimidation check result to both of their DCs. 

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Grim Trophy
requirement: You are an expert in Intimidation
